rows.label: qst202711_msg0001
rows.name:
What is with commotion?
Germon in middle of important ritual!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0002
rows.name: Please do not to disturb.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0003
rows.name:
It not long now until our Lord Moe
is reborn...

rows.label: qst202711_msg0004
rows.name: Lord Moe?

rows.label: qst202711_msg0005
rows.name:
Ohh, right, this is meant to be a
demon-summoning ritual. I forgot.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0006
rows.name:
Yes! We use Rite of Erasure to summon
awesome Nopon demon, Lord Moe!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0007
rows.name:
Rite of Erasure...
It's got a good ring to it.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0008
rows.name:
And why is it you're trying to revive
Lord Moe?

rows.label: qst202711_msg0009
rows.name: It because sadness cover Alst.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0010
rows.name: War, poverty, discrimination, cruelty...

rows.label: qst202711_msg0011
rows.name: and of course death of Divine Beasts...

rows.label: qst202711_msg0012
rows.name: This world now in unstoppable decline!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0013
rows.name: Well then!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0014
rows.name:
We Nopon summon great demon
Lord Moe!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0015
rows.name: He make Alst reborn!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0016
rows.name:
So basically, you want Nopon to
inherit the world?

rows.label: qst202711_msg0017
rows.name:
Wow...
You're dumber than you look.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0018
rows.name: There nothing dumb about Germon!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0019
rows.name:
Acedia... Superbia... Invidia...
And of course Luxuria...

rows.label: qst202711_msg0020
rows.name: Every country only think of own profit!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0021
rows.name:
Nopon littlepon look on human races
and feel great disappointment.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0022
rows.name:
Humans think Nopon are cute pets
or grubby busybodies...

rows.label: qst202711_msg0023
rows.name:
They disrespect Nopon!
They corrupt our world!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0024
rows.name:
That why we raise voices to Lord Moe,
to return dignity to oppressed Nopon...

rows.label: qst202711_msg0025
rows.name:
To destroy world
and be reborn in new, better one!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0026
rows.name:
No, see...
I wasn't calling your cause dumb,
or making light of oppression.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0027
rows.name:
What I'm saying is, it's dumb to pin
all your hopes on something that
doesn't actually exist.

rows.label: qst202711_msg0028
rows.name:
If you wanna change the world, then
don't look to gods or demons to do it
for you! Go and change it yourself!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0029
rows.name:
But in the end, you're not even trying.
You're just throwing everything away...

rows.label: qst202711_msg0030
rows.name: You're like a little kid having a tantrum!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0031
rows.name:
Meh-meh-meh!
Germon will not be insulted like this!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0032
rows.name: But Lord Moe descend any minute now!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0033
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Gwahahaha!

rows.label: qst202711_msg0034
rows.name: Now! See how world change!
